title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 108.4 - Evidence of seed eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 108.4 - Evidence of seed eligibility

State Regulations

In order for seed to be eligible for final certification by
the New York Seed Improvement Cooperative, Inc., it must be received in
containers carrying documentary evidence of its eligibility supplied by another
certifying agency including: (a) variety and kind of seed; (b) amount of seed (pounds or bushels); (c) class of seed (foundation, registered, certified); and
(d) inspection or
lot number. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
108.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
